languages.text: "Если у тебя есть подозреваемый, то говори прямо".
"If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."
languages.original_text: "Если у тебя есть подозреваемый, то говори прямо".

traits.locale_text: "If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."
"If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."

"If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."
"If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."

languages.text: 「もし心当たりの容疑者がいるのなら、率直に言ってくれ」
languages.original_text: "If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."

traits.locale_text: 「もし心当たりの容疑者がいるのなら、率直に言ってくれ」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr einen Verdacht habt, würde ich es begrüßen, wenn Ihr ihn offen nennen würdet."
languages.original_text: "If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr einen Verdacht habt, würde ich es begrüßen, wenn Ihr ihn offen nennen würdet."

languages.text: « Si vous avez un suspect en tête, j'aimerais que vous vous exprimiez sans détour. »
languages.original_text: "If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous avez un suspect en tête, j'aimerais que vous vous exprimiez sans détour. »

languages.text: «Si sospecha de alguien, le agradecería que lo manifestase abiertamente».
languages.original_text: "If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."

traits.locale_text: «Si sospecha de alguien, le agradecería que lo manifestase abiertamente».

languages.text: “如果你在怀疑谁的话，我希望你能直言不讳。”
languages.original_text: "If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."

traits.locale_text: “如果你在怀疑谁的话，我希望你能直言不讳。”

languages.text: "Aklında bir şüpheli varsa açıkça konuşmanı tercih ederim."
languages.original_text: "If you have a suspect in mind, I would appreciate it if you spoke plainly."

traits.locale_text: "Aklında bir şüpheli varsa açıkça konuşmanı tercih ederim."
